name: TogglePlayerClock
notes: Time will automatically advance 6 hours when the player dies.
description: Toggle the in-game clock (top-right corner) for a specific player. When this is enabled, time will progress at 1 minute per second. Weather will also interpolate (slowly change over time) when set using SetWeather/SetPlayerWeather.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player whose clock you want to enable/disable

params_body.name: toggle
params_body.description: 1 to show and 0 to hide. Hidden by default.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The specified player does not exist.
related_fn:
GetPlayerTime: Get the time of a player.
 SetPlayerTime: Set a player's time.
 SetWorldTime: Set the global server time.
